title: THOUGHT / FAIRWEATHER T-500
description: Visual Calculus wants you to research Enemy Technology. Get it after equipping any piece of the dead man's armour.

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "You look down at the white ceramic..."
dialogueTree.text: You look down at the white ceramic sabatons hugging your arches and calves, surprised at how well they fit.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Your movements cause tiny little cl..."
links.text: Your movements cause tiny little clicks, like dice rolling somewhere far away, as the plates reorient to your motions.

links.title: You: "Better late than never, huh?"
links.text: Better late than never, huh?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "I guess so."
links.text: I guess so.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Well, you found that one piece you..."
links.text: Well, you found that one piece you were after, anyway. Don't forget to enjoy it!

links.title: You: "It is good to be an unstoppable cer..."
links.text: It is good to be an unstoppable ceramic man.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Remember, this is a highly speciali..."
links.text: Remember, this is a highly specialized kinetic re-distributor meant to stop bullets. Wear it, observe its properties. See if there's a *weakness* in the design.

links.title: Half Light: "For the day you have to *fight* som..."
links.text: For the day you have to *fight* someone covered in the same material.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Remember, the vitreous enamel mater..."
links.text: Remember, the vitreous enamel material acts as a kinetic re-distributor. It's meant to stop bullets. Wear it, observe its properties. See if there's a *weakness* in the design.

links.title: You: "I will be responsible with this. Th..."
links.text: I will be responsible with this. This is just to protect me from harm, not to show off.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The hardened vitreous enamel, at on..."
links.text: The hardened vitreous enamel, at once sleek and voluptuous, adds a glow to your cheeks and a spring to your step. Just imagine what a full suit of this stuff could do for you!

links.title: Composure: "You really do feel more confident...."
links.text: You really do feel more confident. Invulnerability does that. Even partial invulnerability.

links.title: You: "One down -- two pieces to go. Here..."
links.text: One down -- two pieces to go. Here I come.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Two? Are you sure you're correct th..."
links.text: Two? Are you sure you're correct there? There was a helmet too. Three pieces more like. You were *ambitious*.

links.title: You: "I remember a feeling -- being worri..."
links.text: I remember a feeling -- being worried about crossing paths with someone in this armour.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Then you should prepare -- analyse..."
links.text: Then you should prepare -- analyse this armour, figure out its vulnerabilities.

links.title: You: "This is the long sought after *enem..."
links.text: This is the long sought after *enemy technology*. I can't just enjoy it -- I must *study* it.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yes. You should analyse the armour,..."
links.text: Yes. You should analyse the armour, figure out its vulnerabilities.

links.title: You: "Yeah, I *want* the full suit!"
links.text: Yeah, I *want* the full suit!

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It may be a while before you have a..."
links.text: It may be a while before you have all the pieces. In the meantime, you should analyse the armour, figure out its vulnerabilities.

links.title: You: "Vulnerabilities?"
links.text: Vulnerabilities?

links.title: You: "This gear could line my pockets wit..."
links.text: This gear could line my pockets with cash. I could probably sell it to some other cops.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Certainly, but you may want to hold..."
links.text: Certainly, but you may want to hold on to the armour you have for long enough to properly analyse it, figure out its vulnerabilities.

links.title: You: "This is the long sought after *enem..."
links.text: This is the long sought after *enemy technology*. I can't just enjoy it -- I must *study* it.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The hardened vitreous enamel, at on..."
links.text: The hardened vitreous enamel, at once sleek and light, adds a glow to your cheeks and a spring to your step. Just imagine what a full suit of this stuff could do for you!

links.title: Composure: "You really do feel more confident...."
links.text: You really do feel more confident. Invulnerability does that. Even partial invulnerability.

links.title: You: "Decked out in future-armour. Like a..."
links.text: Decked out in future-armour. Like a cop ought to be.

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "The white ceramic cuirass hugs your..."
dialogueTree.text: The white ceramic cuirass hugs your torso, shielding your vitals without adding much bulk to your form...

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "As you fold your fingers into a fis..."
dialogueTree.text: As you fold your fingers into a fist, you realize you could knock anyone out with one punch... the white ceramic gloves wrap around your digits comfortably.

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "As your head is ensconced in the ce..."
dialogueTree.text: As your head is ensconced in the ceramic helm, you realize --

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Well, it's a bit late to think abou..."
links.text: Well, it's a bit late to think about all this now, isn't it?
